task_description: 融合吼巷IP的头部陶瓷版特征和身体原版体态，生成专业的蓝白配色三视图设计稿

fusion_config.fusion_prompt: Create a professional three-view character design sheet (front, side, back views arranged horizontally on white background). Blue and white cartoon cat mascot IP design combining features from multiple references: 1) HEAD: Use the ceramic style head design with exaggerated roaring expression, detailed facial features from reference 2; 2) BODY: Use the standing pose, body proportions, and limb positions from reference 3; 3) COLOR & PATTERN: Apply blue and white color scheme with decorative ethnic patterns from reference 4; 4) LAYOUT: Follow the three-view arrangement format from reference 1. Ensure natural connection between head and body, consistent proportions across all three views, smooth texture with fine 3D rendering details. Q-style proportion, professional character turnaround sheet.

metadata.notes: 多源特征融合：头部(陶瓷版) + 身体(原版) + 配色(蓝白) + 布局(三视图)
